amendment.description: Amendment reduces the National Capital Arts and Cultural Affairs funding by $4,500,000 and applies the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered numbered 249 printed in the congressional record to reduce the National Capital Arts and Cultural Affairs funding by $4,500,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Canseco amendment (A043) Agreed to by recorded vote: 248 - 177 (Roll no. 69).
